original_text: And the Lord said unto Jacob, Return unto the land of thy fathers, and to thy kindred; and I will be with thee.
korean_text: 여호와께서 야곱에게 이르시되 네 조상의 땅 네 족속에게로 돌아가라 내가 너와 함께 있으리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Jacob
Return unto the land of thy fathers
and I will be with thee
